lead_paragraph: Rod Thorn and Ed Stefanski once teamed to build the Nets into an N.B.A. championship contenders. Reunited in Philadelphia, they will try to resuscitate the 76ers.
snippet: Rod Thorn and Ed Stefanski once teamed to build the Nets into an N.B.A. championship contenders. Reunited in Philadelphia, they will try to resuscitate the 76ers.
